articles.author: MICHAEL R. SISAK, JENNIFER PELTZ, ERIC TUCKER, MICHELLE L. PRICE
articles.title: Trump hush money trial: Prosecution, defense look to score final points - The Associated Press
articles.description: Prosecutors and defense lawyers in Donald Trump’s New York hush money trial are set to deliver closing arguments. Each side wants to score final points with the jury Tuesday before it starts deliberating the fate of the first former American president charged…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Prosecutors and defense lawyers in Donald Trumps hush money trial are set to deliver closing arguments to the jury Tuesday, each side looking to score final points with the panel before… [+5086 chars]
